contest-event.event-date:
Dec. 1, 2012 D Wessex Brass Band Association Contest
Wessex BBA Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Wessex Brass Band Association wessex-brass-band-association-contest
March & Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points)
Pavilion, Weymouth Championship Section: Woodfalls First Section: Hyde Second Section: Otterbourne Brass Third Section: Gillingham Fourth Section: Andover Town
Kevin Bolton Plaque as Best Instrumentalist: John Starks (Woodfalls) Tom Gomersall Memorial Cup as Best Euphonium: John Starks (Woodfalls) Maurice Woods Trophy as Best Cornet in 1st section: Dennis Curlett (Hyde Band) Arthur Spence Trophy as Best Bass Section: Woodfalls James Winter Trophy as Best Percussion Section: Hyde Band South Wiltshire Cup as Best Conductor: Paul Williams (Gillingham Imperial)
Dec. 2, 2012, 5:23 p.m. March 11, 2013, 10:07 p.m.
1 Woodfalls Band Phil Randell A Tale as yet Untold
2 Hyde Band Helen Kinder Dances and Arias
3 Verwood Concert Brass Kevin Smith Essay [Gregson]
4 Poole Borough Band David Evans Symphony of Marches
5 Gillingham Imperial Silver Band Paul Williams Penlee
6 Otterbourne Brass Chris Davis Kaleidoscope [Sparke]
7 Ocean Brass Jonathan Lush-Camps An Epic Symphony
8 Downton Band Roland Wright A Salford Sinfonietta
9 Horsham Borough Andrew Kershaw Symphony of Thanksgiving
10 Andover Town Steve Large A British Isles Suite
11 New Forest Brass Ian Luxford Diamond Heritage
12 Bath Spa Band David Walker Tournament for Brass
13 Bream Silver Band Bryn James Scheherazade
14 Weymouth Concert Brass Adam Glynn Hollywood!
15 Corsham Band Colin Hogg Divertimento [Barry]
16 Swindon Brass Fran Cowley The Once and Future King
